content:
Manifest Class

Definition

Represents base functionality common to all supported manifest types.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public abstract class Manifest
Inheritance
Object
Manifest
Derived
AssemblyManifest
DeployManifest
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)

Constructors

Manifest()

Initializes a new instance of the Manifest class.

protected Manifest ();
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Properties

AssemblyIdentity

Gets or sets the identity of the manifest.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity AssemblyIdentity { get; set; }
Value
AssemblyIdentity

An AssemblyIdentity object representing the identity of the manifest.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

AssemblyReferences

Gets the set of assemblies that the manifest references.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReferenceCollection AssemblyReferences { get; }
Value
AssemblyReferenceCollection

An AssemblyReferenceCollection object representing the set of assemblies that the manifest references.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

Description

Gets or sets a textual description for the manifest.

public string Description { get; set; }
Value
String

A string describing the manifest.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

EntryPoint

Gets or sets an assembly reference that is the entry point of the application.

public virtual Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference EntryPoint { get; set; }
Value
AssemblyReference

An AssemblyReference object representing an assembly reference that is the entry point of the application.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

FileReferences

Gets the set of files that the manifest references.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReferenceCollection FileReferences { get; }
Value
FileReferenceCollection

A FileReferenceCollection object representing the set of files that the manifest references.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

InputStream

Gets or sets the input stream from which the manifest was read.

public System.IO.Stream InputStream { get; set; }
Value
Stream

A Stream object representing the input stream from which the manifest was read.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

Remarks

ManifestWriter uses this property to reconstitute input that is not represented in the object representation.

OutputMessages

Gets a collection of current error and warning messages.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection OutputMessages { get; }
Value
OutputMessageCollection

An OutputMessageCollection object, which contains a collection of current error and warning messages.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

ReadOnly

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the manifest is operating in read-only or read-write mode.

public bool ReadOnly { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value indicating whether the manifest is operating in read-only or read-write mode.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

Remarks

If you only need to read a manifest, set this flag to True. If you need to write a new manifest, set this flag to False. The default is False. This property provides additional context for the manifest generator, and affects how some error messages are reported.

SourcePath

Gets or sets the location where the manifest was loaded or saved.

public string SourcePath { get; set; }
Value
String

A string indicating the location where the manifest was loaded or saved.

Attributes
XmlIgnoreAttribute

XmlAssemblyIdentity

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.AssemblyIdentity* property to an XML file.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity XmlAssemblyIdentity { get; set; }
Value
AssemblyIdentity

An object that specifies the identify of an assembly.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlElementAttribute

XmlAssemblyReferences

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.AssemblyReferences* property to an XML file.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference[] XmlAssemblyReferences { get; set; }
Value
AssemblyReference[]

An array of manifest assembly references.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlArrayAttribute

XmlDescription

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.Description* property to an XML file.

public string XmlDescription { get; set; }
Value
String

To be added.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlAttributeAttribute

XmlFileReferences

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.FileReferences* property to an XML file.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference[] XmlFileReferences { get; set; }
Value
FileReference[]

An array of manifest file reference objects.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlArrayAttribute

XmlSchema

Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the schema to an XML file.

public string XmlSchema { get; set; }
Value
String

The schema to an XML file.

Attributes
BrowsableAttribute EditorBrowsableAttribute XmlAttributeAttribute

Methods

ResolveFiles(String[])

Locates all specified assembly and file references by searching in the specified directories.

public void ResolveFiles (string[] searchPaths);
Parameters
searchPaths
String[]

An array of strings specifying the directories to search.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

The location of each referenced assembly and file is required for hash computation and assembly identity resolution. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the OutputMessageCollection object.

ResolveFiles()

Locates all specified assembly and file references by searching in the same directory as the loaded manifest, or in the current directory.

public void ResolveFiles ();
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

The location of each referenced assembly and file is required for hash computation and assembly identity resolution. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the OutputMessageCollection object.

ToString()

Returns the manifest name.

public override string ToString ();
Returns
String

A string indicating the name of the manifest.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

UpdateFileInfo()

Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file.

public void UpdateFileInfo ();
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly. Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the OutputMessageCollection object.

UpdateFileInfo(String)

Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file, using the specified version of the target framework.

public void UpdateFileInfo (string targetFrameworkVersion);
Parameters
targetFrameworkVersion
String

The version of the target framework to use. Null if no target framework version. If no target framework version, uses sha256 algorithm.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly. Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the OutputMessageCollection object.

Validate()

Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.

public virtual void Validate ();
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the OutputMessageCollection object.

ValidatePlatform()

Validates the manifest platform.

protected void ValidatePlatform ();
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the OutputMessageCollection object.
